name: Unity Turn-based strategy tutorial game
description:
Prototype of a 2d turn-based civ2-like game made in Unity 2021.

Its for a tutorial that will be posted on 

-> https://www.youtube.com/c/SunnyValleyStudio

Use mouse to select Units and drag the Units to move them. Use "Next Turn" button to make enemies move and to reset the movement of your units. 

*Build Town first

**Might contain bugs - I will be testing and updating it as the tutorial on progresses :)

***By clicking Download you can get the full project. It is free but you can also donate to support me in making those free tutorials.

Assets used: 

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack-rpg-expansion 

https://cimeto.itch.io/16x16-strategyrpg-bronze-iron-age-icons
